long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Grid Creator
Introduction
Image Grid Creator is a Chrome extension designed to help users extract images from web pages and display them in a customizable grid layout.

Features
Automatic Image Extraction

Scans all images on the webpage, including regular images and background images.
Supports lazy-loaded images by scrolling to load them.
Smart Filtering

Filters out placeholder images (e.g., spacer.gif, pixel.gif) and small images automatically.
Grid Layout Creation

Allows users to select images and create a clean, customizable grid layout with a single click.
Ensures a visually appealing arrangement.
Easy-to-Use Interface

Simple and clear interface requiring minimal effort to operate.
Installation
Search for Image Grid Creator on the Chrome Web Store.
Click the "Add to Chrome" button to install.
How to Use
Open any webpage containing images.
Click the Image Grid Creator icon in the browser toolbar.
The extension will automatically extract all valid images from the webpage and display them in a popup window.
Select the images you want and click the "Create Grid Layout" button.
The grid layout will be displayed directly on the webpage.
FAQs
Q: Why are some images not appearing?
A: Some images may not have fully loaded. Try refreshing the page or checking your internet connection.

Q: Can I select multiple images?
A: Yes, you can click to select as many images as you need from the popup window.

Q: Can I download the grid layout?
A: This feature is not yet available in the current version but may be added in future updates.

License
This extension does not collect or store any user data. Permissions are used solely to extract and display images from the currently active tab.

Feel free to include this in your project or modify it further as needed!
